thread.section_title: OCEANE Body.Mind.Soul Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OCEANE Body.Mind.Soul | oceanebeauty.com
thread.title: Pat F (Patti)
thread.title_full: OCEANE Body.Mind.Soul reviewed by Pat F (Patti)

author: Pat F (Patti)
title: Pat F (Patti)
text:
KUDOS to Farrenn Holt, Customer Service Specialist - I was disappointed that the Turquoise Pearl Face Lift Mask cylinder ran out of product after only 6 months of purchasing it and it was supposed to last one year. I emailed my complaint to Forever Flawless and within a day I received a note asking for my address so they could send a replacement to me - I was shocked! I've never been treated so kindly by a company; it was truly a great experience. Would order anything from them - they stand behind their product.
Patricia
